phrases.song-list: Click Here for the full list of {heardle-name} Heardle songs.
phrases.infinite-pub-text:
Click Here to play 
 {heardle-name} Heardle Infinite!
phrases.infinite-win-text: Good job! You got the {heardle-name} song within {unlocked-time} seconds.
phrases.default-win-text: You got today's {heardle-name} song within {unlocked-time} seconds.
phrases.infinite-lose-text: You didn't get the {heardle-name} song. Try another one!
phrases.default-lose-text: You didn't get today's {heardle-name} song. Better luck tomorrow!
phrases.critical-mode: Critical mode: Half time, limited listens
phrases.random-start: Randomize start time (defaults to the beginning of the track)
phrases.sudoku-beginner: Beginner: Every cell has at least 10 possible answers.
phrases.sudoku-standard: Standard: Every cell has at least 2 possible answers. The daily puzzle uses these rules.
phrases.sudoku-proud: Proud: Every cell has 2-15 possible answers.
phrases.sudoku-critical: Critical: Every cell has 1-10 possible answers. Weighting is removed from category selection, making all prompts equally likely. This setting is not recommended.

!COMMENT!: Variant link is  "infinite" when infinite is false, or "base game" when infinite is true
